desc_short: Boost restoration amount of recovery items used in battle, and boost MP by 20%, and SPR by 30%
戰鬥中提升恢復道具的恢復量+提高20%MP、30%精神的數值
전투 중에만 회복 아이템 회복량 상승+MP 20%, 정신력 30% 상승

desc_long: Boosts restoration amount of recovery items used in battle, and boosts MP by 20%, and SPR by 30%.
戰鬥中提升恢復道具的恢復量，並提高20%MP、30%精神的數值。
전투 중에만 회복 아이템 회복량이 상승하고, MP가 20%, 정신력이 30% 상승합니다.
Augmente l'efficacité des objets de soin en combat, augmente les PM de 20% et la PSY de 30%.
Erhöht Wirkung von Wiederherstellungsgegenständen, erhöht MP um 20% und PSY um 30%.
Aumenta la potencia de objetos curativos durante el combate, aumenta los PM un 20% y el ESP un 30%.
